column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////While not the cheepest Tapas restraurant in town
column2: most definately the largest selection of veggie
column4: and even glutten free  tapsa in town.  If you are advensuresome
column5: just pick a veggie or meat and ask the waitress to recommend one fothe many Tapas.  You will not be steered wrong.  We had several of the specials including the cheese plate.
